price: Walio fuatwa watakapo wakataa wale walio wafuata, na hali ya kuwa wamekwisha iona adhabu; na yatakatika mafungamano yao.
arabic: إِذۡ تَبَرَّأَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتُّبِعُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُواْ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَابُ
footnotes: Siku hiyo wafuasi watatamani wakubwa wao wawaokoe na upotofu, nao watawakataa na kujitenga nao wakisema: Hatukukwiteni mtut'ii katika kumuasi Mola wenu Mlezi. Hilo ni pumbao lenu tu na uovu wa vitendo vyenu. Makhusiano baina yao na mapenzi waliyo kuwa nayo duniani yatakatika siku hiyo, na watakuwa maadui wao kwa wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh tabarra-a alladhīna ittubiʿū mina alladhīna ittabaʿū wara-awū al-ʿadhāba wataqaṭṭaʿat bihimu al-asbābu
